items.title: Be prepared for almost anything with this magnetic multi-USB cable and adapter kit, now $13.50
items.summary:
Elebase Multi-USB Cable and Adapter Kit

Buy for $13.50 (Reg. $15)

Clip the on-page 10% off coupon.

What we love

While most of just want to skip to a world where just about everything uses USB-C, we aren’t there yet, and who knows if we ever will be. That said, a versatile kit like this can help you interact with various types of ports thanks to various adapters that can be found inside of the magnetic case. Examples include a compact 100W USB-C cable, adapters ranging from USB-A to microUSB, Lightning, and more.

items.summary:
As part of its Tech Refresh sale, Dell is offering Alienware’s Area-51 gaming desktops with up to $850 off. Multiple configs of this desktop are on sale right now with prices starting at $3,099.99 shipped. The most powerful variant with the Ultra 9 285K/64GB/4TB/RTX 5090 config is $5,249.99 shipped. That’s down from its usual price of $6,100, and $50 less than its previous low. With an $850 discount, this is the lowest price we have tracked for this desktop to date. If you’re looking for something a bit easier on your wallet, the Area-51 with Ultra 7 265K/32GB/2TB/5070 Ti is $3,099.99 shipped, which is down $650 from its usual price of $3,750.
